```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(readxl)
library(xlsx)
library(dplyr)
library(ggpubr)
library(ggsci)
library(rstatix)
library (cowplot)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, cache = TRUE)

```


```{R Load Data}

All_Data <- read_excel("All Data.xlsx", sheet = 3)

All_Data$FA <- as.factor(All_Data$FA)

```

``` {R Protein}

ggbarplot(All_Data, x = "FA", "Protein",
       add = "mean_se", error.plot = "upper_errorbar", palette = "npg", legend = "none", fill = "FA", xlab = "OPLA Concentration (uM)", ylab = "Protein (mg/mL)") +
  scale_y_continuous(expand = c(0,0)) +
theme(axis.text.x = element_text(color = "grey20", size = 16),
axis.text.y = element_text(color = "grey20", size = 16),
axis.title.x = element_text(color = "grey20", size = 18),
axis.title.y = element_text(color = "grey20", size = 18))
ggsave('C:/Users/fwestcott/OneDrive - Nexus365/Desktop/Results/OPLA-LF-vs-HF/graphs/Protein.png')

pairwise.test = All_Data %>% 
  t_test(TAG ~ FA) %>% 
   adjust_pvalue(method = 'bonferroni')

ggbarplot(All_Data, x = "FA", "TAG",
       add = "mean_se", error.plot = "upper_errorbar", palette = "npg", legend = "none", fill = "FA", xlab = "OPLA Concentration (uM)", ylab = "Intracellular TAG
(umol/g of protein)") +
  scale_y_continuous(expand = c(0,0), limits=c(0, 700)) +
theme(axis.text.x = element_text(color = "grey20", size = 16),
axis.text.y = element_text(color = "grey20", size = 16),
axis.title.x = element_text(color = "grey20", size = 18),
axis.title.y = element_text(color = "grey20", size = 18)) +
  stat_pvalue_manual(pairwise.test, label = "p.adj", y.position = 550, step.increase = 0.1)
ggsave('C:/Users/fwestcott/OneDrive - Nexus365/Desktop/Results/OPLA-LF-vs-HF/graphs/TAG.png')
```

``` {R}
FA_Uptake <- read_excel("All Data.xlsx", sheet = 4)

FA_Uptake$FA <- as.factor(FA_Uptake$FA)

ggbarplot(FA_Uptake, x = "FA", "FA_Uptake",
       add = "mean_se", error.plot = "upper_errorbar", palette = "npg", legend = "none", fill = "FA",   xlab = "OPLA Concentration (uM)", ylab = "Fatty Acid Uptake (%)", remove = "OPLA = 0") +
  scale_y_continuous(expand = c(0,0), limits=c(0, 100)) +
theme(axis.text.x = element_text(color = "grey20", size = 16),
axis.text.y = element_text(color = "grey20", size = 16),
axis.title.x = element_text(color = "grey20", size = 18),
axis.title.y = element_text(color = "grey20", size = 18))
ggsave('C:/Users/fwestcott/OneDrive - Nexus365/Desktop/Results/OPLA-LF-vs-HF/graphs/FA_Uptake.png')


```
